short_summary: Purchase of dust suppressant for Wemindji, Eastmain, and Waskaganish
description: PWGSC, on behalf of Transport Canada, is issuing this request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a dust suppressant including delivery at Wemindji, Eastmain and Waskaganish (Quebec), as detailed in Annex “Statement of Requirements”.
full_summary:
### Title: Dust Suppressant

**Offering Reference Number:** WS4387524335-Doc4591490516
**Modification Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** WS4387524335

**Publication Date:** May 22, 2024
**Tender Closes:** June 14, 2024, @ 2:00 PM (EDT)
**Last Modification Date:** June 7, 2024

### Product Information

* Proposed product: **Dust Supressant**
* UNSPSC Code: 25191500
* Product description: *Air Transportation Support Systems and Equipment (delivering to Wemindji, Eastmain, and Waskaganish in Quebec)*

### Notice of Request for Proposal

#### Introduction

Transport Canada, represented by the Public Procurement Services Branch (PPSS), are issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the purchase of a dust suppressant solution involving delivery to the specified locations.

#### Requirements

Please review the detailed description of requirements, found in the annex entitled "Statement of Requirements". A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to all Offerors who bid on the previous solicitation number Doc4398556765 (closed on March 18, 2024).

#### Invitation to Bid

Offerors are invited to submit their proposals in response to this RFP.

### Important Information

All communications and/or submissions will only be accepted through the Ariba online platform. Refer to the notice URL below for further details.

#### Notice URL
[https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19787184?extsite=MTk3ODcxODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19787184?extsite=MTk3ODcxODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Questions, submissions, or comments regarding this solicitation can be directed to:
* Francois S Martineau, Martineau.Francois@mtpsps... (Project Manager)
* Phone: None (email only)
* Main Government Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5. 
* Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) 

Note that references to A
